participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and sociable, enjoys expressing herself through theater and cooking.
participant_1.background: I am unmarried and I enjoy my freedom. I love to watch 16 Candles with my family because we can relate to the characters. I am a great cook. I am in a local theater company. I try to find new ways to eat cheese in my spare time.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Passionate about storytelling, with a love for nature and a strong connection to family.
participant_2.background: I was nervous when I first started writing my own songs, but I'm glad I did it. I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love sports. I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths. I am happily married to a retired engineer who enjoys spending time with our cats and traveling. I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm currently working on a short story about The Walking Dead.
Oh wow, that's awesome! I'm a huge fan of that show.
Me too! I've been watching since the beginning.
What's your favorite episode?
That's a tough one, but I think I'd have to say the season two finale.
That was a great episode! I loved the way it all came together.
Me too! It was so intense.
What are you hoping for in the next season?
I'm hoping that they'll finally figure out a way to defeat the walkers.
That would be great! I'm also hoping that they'll find a way to get back to Alexandria.
Me too! I miss those characters.
It's been a while since we've seen them.
I know! I hope they're okay.
Me too.
Well, it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a good day!
You too!
